ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I thought you’d be here soon.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here, take this. I’m sure it’ll be useful to you.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
No need to thank me... And don’t hesitate to
use it.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... Don’t say anything
and just take this.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2102_02_10: Heh... Was it something you wanted?
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I was waiting for you so I could give this to you.
Please take it.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
When you want to share your thoughts and
feelings with others, there’s no need to say much.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Just express them through your actions. That’s my
way of doing things.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2202_01_10: I don’t get bored talking to you.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2301_01_10: This is a surprise... I’m happy to accept.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2301_02_10: I’ll definitely return the favor. I promise.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Looks like time’s up. Let’s talk again sometime.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Haha... Time sure flies when you’re having fun.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
See you around, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’m looking forward to the next time we meet.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I’m sure my Pokémon would be able to relax
here... I think I’ll do the same.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Just give me a shout if there’s anything you want
to talk about.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
It’s not always a good idea to share everything
that’s on your mind... Sometimes it can hurt the
other person.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
At the same time, some things can’t be
communicated unless you say them out loud.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
It’s never easy to rebuild a relationship that was
once broken.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I couldn’t have dealt with the situation I had with
my family if I’d been on my own.
ch0119_00_gladion_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
There were people in Alola who helped me...
And now, I got to meet you here.
